voca.pattern: It should be no longer than
voca.means_en: B : It should be no longer than 30 minutes.\n

voca.pattern: How long will it be till ~ ?
voca.means_en: A : How long will it be till they get here?\n

voca.means_ko: ~ 하는지 몰라서요.\n~ 한지 궁금해서요.\n~ 하는지 해서요.
voca.means_en:
I was wondering if you have a spare minute tonight.
I was wondering if you delivered?
I was wondering if you'd like to have coffee sometime.
I was wondering if you could help me.
I was wondering if I could have a break.
